name: Christmas Card Bundles

These cards come with a ribbed golden envelope, wrapped in a  cellophane sleeve and tied in a bundle with a bow.

name: Wolf Nail Tattoo Set
description:
Indulge your animal instincts with this set of Wolf nail tattoos

With over 50 individual transfers of different sizes to use on your nails, you can get over 5 wears out of this little set.

The design applies just like a temporary tattoo. Just cut out the design, place it face down on the nail and wet the back with a cloth until the backing paper slides off easily. Be sure to then apply a layer of clear nail polish to keep the tattoo in place. 
The design works best over a light or neutral base coat.

These nail tattoos come beautifully packaged with the instructions on the back.

We also have a set of temporary tattoos that match this set here: http://www.fawnandthistle.com/product/wolf-pack-temporary-tattoos

name: Sun, Moon and Stars //Temporary Tattoos Pack of 5
description:
//Pain Free Tattoos//

This set of temporary tattoos allows you to experiment with body art, without the commitment.

This set of five temporary tattoos features Kirsten McNee's original Sun and Moon illustrations and other specially drawn star tattoos that compliment the main designs.

They come beautifully packaged with how-to instructions on the back.

...

The tattoos will last for a few days, though the life of the product will vary depending on where you choose to place it. If place around the hands, wrist or ankles, for example, or anywhere where clothing will rub, the tattoo will wear off faster.

...

Dimensions:

Sun: 4cm x 4cm
Moon: 4cm x 4cm
5 Point Star: 1.5cm x 1.5cm
Fancy Star: 2.5cm x 2.5cm

**Customers assume full responsibility when buying and using this product**

We also have a matching set of Nail Tattoos to be found here: http://www.fawnandthistle.com/product/sun-moon-and-stars-nail-tattoo-set

© Kirsten McNee 2013

name: Nature Girl A4 Giclee Fashion Illustration Print
description:
This is an A4 signed Giclee print of our original fashion  illustration "Nature Girl". 
It is printed on the lightly textured 350 gsm Museum Etching paper by Hahnemuhle.
Print is approx. 8 x 11 inches (A4) and will be carefully packaged in a protective sleeve with a stiff recycled board backing.


The print is also available as a card and has a set of accompanying temporary tattoos.

http://www.fawnandthistle.com/product/nature-girl-temporary-tattoos-set-pack-of-6

**Please note, this is a listing for an unframed print**


© Kirsten McNee 2013

name: Animal Alphabet ABC's Print // A3
description:
These beautiful Animal Alphabet prints would be the perfect addition to any child's nursery or bedroom.
A3 in size (420 x 297 mm), the prints are made up of hand drawn letters illustrated with animals that begin with that specific letter and would be a brilliant way to not only help with learning the alphabet, but also to learn about the various creatures who inhabit this planet with us.

Printed on a high quality, lightly textured, natural white 300gsm paper, the print comes with a white mount, backed on card and wrapped in cellophane. It will be shipped flat.

Please specify what colour you would like at check out.

Please note, as the mounts are made to order, it will take about approx. a week and a half for shipping. And the watermark is obviously not on the final product.

If you would like the print without the mount (making this product cost £25 and shipping cheaper) then don't hesitate to get in touch.

//The Animalphabet is also available as personalised name prints or greeting cards //

©Kirsten McNee 2013

name: 3 Cards for £6- Pick 'n' Mix Custom Selection
description:
Can't decide which of our cards to buy? 

Then why not select one of our lovely card bundles and get 3 cards for £6?

This is a custom card bundle and you can choose any 3 of our designs yourself!

Simply add this product to your basket and email fawnandthistle@mail.com explaining which 3 of our card designs you require.

**You can view all of our cards individually within the 'cards' section

Our cards measure 105mm x 148mm (A6) and are printed on 260 gsm, glossy coated card. They come with an envelope, wrapped in a  cellophane sleeve and tied in a bundle with a bow.

name: Personalised Animal Alphabet Name print
description:
These beautiful, custom made, illustrated baby name prints are the perfect gift for the parents of a new born, birthdays, christenings or christmas.
The prints are made up of hand drawn letters illustrated with the animals that begin with that specific letter and would make a brilliant keepsake.

Available in pink, blue or black and printed on to a heavy-weight, high quality paper, the prints are roughly A3 in size, though the size depends on the length of the name.

When making your purchase, please email us at fawnandthistle@mail.com referencing your order and letting us know the name that you'd like. If you have a particular mount colour preference (it's generally pink mount for girls, blue mount for boys and all white for the black lettering, but white mounts can be used on all), then let us know that too.


........

// I currently have a few names already in stock which are ready to post within three days. //

name: Add a Frame
description:
If you have chosen an a4 print, why not add a frame to your purchase?

We will lovingly frame the prints for you and carefully package them, before delivering to your door. 

Simply select either 'A4 White Box Frame' from the drop down list.

**If you purchase more than one unframed print, please email us to confirm which print you would like framed.

Shipping- (UK Only) This item will be sent via 'signed for delivery' to ensure that it reaches you in excellent condition. 

Description:
A4 White Box Frame- 
This is a beautiful white wood box frame, your chosen print will be displayed within a crisp white mount with an aperture of 21cm x 30cm. The overall dimensions of the frame are (approx. 32cm x 42.5cm x 3.5cm). The glass front will protect your chosen artwork.

The A4 frame comes ready to hang and does not come with fittings for standing.

name: Norman A4 Signed Giclée Print
description:
Sangita Southgate's fantastical illustration of a rabbit blowing bubbles has been Giclée printed onto natural white, 315gsm, 100% cotton rag, acid free fine art paper.

This high quality print would make a beautiful addition to any wall and would be the perfect gift for those who enjoy a bit of bubbly.

Each print is signed by Sangita Southgate and is carefully wrapped in cellophane and protected by a sheet of recycled board. 

**Please note, this print is unframed

Dimensions: 
A4 (29.7cm x 21 cm / 11.7 x 8.3 in)
or A5 (21 x 14.8 cm / 8.3 x 5.8 in)

name: William A4 Signed Giclée Print
description:
Sangita Southgate's surreal illustration of a horse sailing a 155 horsepower boat has been Giclée printed onto natural white, 315gsm, 100% cotton rag, acid free fine art paper.

This high quality print would make a beautiful addition to any wall and would be the perfect gift for those who just love boys' toys.

Each print is signed by Sangita Southgate and is carefully wrapped in cellophane and protected by a sheet of recycled board. 

**Please note, this print is unframed

Dimensions: 
A4 (29.7cm x 21 cm / 11.7 x 8.3 in)
or A5 (21 x 14.8 cm / 8.3 x 5.8 in)

name: The Six Swans A3 Giclee Print
description:
This is an A3 signed Giclee print of our original screen print The Six Swans, based on the Brothers Grimm's tale of the same name. It is printed on the lightly textured, high quality 350 gsm Museum Etching paper by Hahnemuhle.

Print is approx. 16.5 x 12 inches (A3) and will be carefully packaged in a protective sleeve with a stiff recycled board backing. 

**Please note, this is a listing for an unframed print**

//If you are interested in buying this print A4 (approx. 8 x 11 inches) then don't hesitate to contact us//

name: The Rooted Doe A4 Giclee Print
description:
This is an A4 signed Giclee print of our original illustration The Rooted Doe. It is printed on a lightly textured 315 gsm natural white, 100% cotton rag, acid free fine art paper.
Print is approx. 8 x 11 inches (A4) and will be carefully packaged in a protective sleeve with a stiff recycled board backing. 

**Please note, this is a listing for an unframed print**

//Also available as an A5 print (approx. 8 x 6 inches)//

name: The Great Rooted Stag A4 Giclee Print
description:
This is an A4 signed Giclee print of our original screenprint and illustration The Great Rooted Stag. It is printed on the lightly textured 310 gsm German Etching Hahnemuhle paper.
Print is approx. 8 x 11 inches (A4) and will be carefully packaged in a protective sleeve with a stiff recycled board backing. 

**Please note, this is a listing for an unframed print and the print shown framed is the original screenprint, so there is a slight difference in the tone of the paper**

//Also available as an A5 print (approx. 8 x 6 inches) and as the original screenprint//

description:

Each print is signed by Sangita Southgate and is carefully wrapped in cellophane and protected by a sheet of recycled board.

name: Welcome Aboard A4 Screen Print
description:
Measuring approx. 8 x 11 inches (A4), this 3-colour screen print has been hand printed on a heavy weight, acid free 100% cotton Somerset paper. 
The print is signed and editioned, so you know it is your own unique piece of art and is a bargain now it is on sale. 

It will be carefully packaged in a protective sleeve and will be shipped flat inside a stiff card backed envelope.

**Please note, this is a listing for an unframed print**

name: Norman the Rabbit A6 Greeting Card
description:
A lovely greeting card featuring one of our original illustrations of Norman the Rabbit. 

This card is A6, printed onto TruCard a specialist greeting card material that is coated and scratchproof on the outside, and uncoated inside. We use heavy 300gsm card for high-quality greeting cards that last. Each card comes with a ribbed brown envelope and wrapped in a cellophane sleeve.

** To receive 3 cards for £6 simply add our product '3 cards for £6-Pick 'n' Mix' and email fawnandthistle@mail.com to explain which 3 of our cards you require! 

**Please note that if 3 cards are added separately to your basket, you will not receive this discount

          //Norman is also available as an A5 and A4 print//
